Class DbUtils

java.lang.Object
  ch.ethz.dcg.jukefox.data.db.DbUtils

public class DbUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Contains simple static methods required in conjunction with SQL statements etc. (e.g. coord-SQL, java.util.Date -> java.sql.Date, etc.)
